definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: passover (usu. (Thes and most) from I. [[פסח]], with reference to Ex 12:13 etc.; Reuss:Gesch. AT § 58 passing over into new year; Schaefer:Passah-Mazzoth (1900), 346 cp. As. pašâḫu, soothe, placate [deity], < be soothed, Pi. trans., Jen:ZA iv (1889), 275 Zim:Bab. Rel. i (1896). Gloss.; ii (1899), 92; Schwally:Idiot, 124 fr. II. [[פסח]], of sacred dance);—abs. ´[[פ]] Ex 12:11 + ; [[פָָּסַח]] v:Ex 12:21 + ; pl. [[פְּסָחִים]] 2Ch 30:17 + 3 t.;—
sacrifice of Passover, involving communion-meal, hence a species of peace-offering (cf. I. [[זֶבַח]]

definitions.title: II. 2
definitions.body: ), ´[[הוא לי]] ´[[זֶבַח פ]] Ex Ex 12:27 (J), cf. v:Ex 12:11 (P); ´[[וׇבַח פ]] De 16:2, De 16:5, De 16:6; ´[[אבל הפ]] 2Ch 30:18; the special feature lay in the application of blood to homes to consecrate them: cf. sim. Bab. rite of purification Zim:ib. ii. 126–7.

the animal victim of the passover : ´[[שׁחט פ]] Ex 12:21 (J) 2Ch 30:15, 2Ch 35:1, 2Ch 35:6, 2Ch 35:11, Ez 6:20, cf. 2Ch 30:17; [[באשׁ]] ´[[בשׁל הפ]] 2Ch 35:13; [[לפסחים]] 2Ch 35:7, 2Ch 35:8, 2Ch 35:9. [Passover animals (cf. Br:Hex.206) were [[חאׂן]] flock Ex 12:21 (J), [[שֶׁה]] v:Ex 12:3, v:Ex 12:4, v:Ex 12:5, incl. [[כֶּבֶשׁ]] and [[עֵז]] v:Ex 12:5 (P); [[חאן ובקר]] De 16:2; large numbers of all these ([[שֶׂה]] not used) in Josiah's Passover, act. to 2Ch 35:7, 2Ch 35:8, 2Ch 35:9, but evident mingling of whole burnt-offerings for the passover with special passover victim.]

festival of the passover : ´[[חג הפ]] Ex 34:25 (J); ´[[פ]]([[ה]]) Le 23:5, Nu 28:16, Nu 33:3, Jos 5:11 (P) Ez Eze 45:21; ´[[חֻקַּת הפ]] Ex 12:43, Nu 9:12, Nu 9:14 (P); ´[[עשׂה פ]] Ex 12:48, Nu 9:2, Nu 9:4, Nu 9:5, Nu 9:6, Nu 9:10, Nu 9:13, Nu 9:14, Jos 5:10 (P) De 16:1, 2Ki 23:21, 2Ki 23:22, 2Ki 23:23, 2Ch 30:1, 2Ch 30:2, 2Ch 30:5, 2Ch 35:1, 2Ch 35:16, 2Ch 35:17, 2Ch 35:18, 2Ch 35:18, 2Ch 35:19, Ezr 6:19; it was held in month [[הָאָבִיב]] De 16:1, [[בָּעָָרֶב]] v:De 16:6; on 14th day Jos 5:10 (P), of 1st month Ez Eze 45:21; [[בֵּין הערבים]](Ex 12:6) Le 23:5, Nu 9:5 (P); if impossible at that time, then on 14th of 2nd month Nu 9:10, Nu 9:12. [No ref. to [[פֶּסַח]] in E ; J subordinates it to [[מַצּוֹת]] (the great feast of JE); in D it predom. over [[מחות]]; 1' makes it first in importance (Br: Hex. 195 f.)].]
